title: Alba: A Wildlife Adventure
description: Alba: A Wildlife Adventure is a game about a young girl who discovers her love for nature, and makes it her mission to save the local nature reserve from demolishion.

The game was widely recognised for its messaging about nature preservation, alongside its launch campaign of '1 download = 1 tree'. Through our partnership with Ecology we planted over 1 million mangrove trees in Madagascar.
I was the art lead of a team of 8 artists, creating a rich environment with more than 60 animals for the player to discover. I also worked on the subsequent updates.
